name: iowan
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
someone from the US state of Iowa: She was the first Iowan to receive the award. Iowans are not into sensationalism.
More examplesFewer examplesHerbert Hoover is the only Iowan ever elected president.Iowan Ted Kooser is the author of 10 collections of poetry.Not every Iowan agrees that colleges should be promoting themselves in a language other than English.

belonging or relating to the US state of Iowa or its people: He moved in with his strict Iowan grandparents. "We're an Iowan company," he said proudly.
More examplesFewer examplesThe Des Moines Register is the main Iowan newspaper.My Iowan mother pronounced "pecan" pi- kahn.The Iowan economy is now doing better than it has for the past ten years.
